data.title: Aida: The Story of Verdi's Famous Opera. by Taylor, Dortha A., Illustrated by William O'Donovan: Very Good Hardcover (1952) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - Hardcover - New York: Acorn House, 1952 - 1952 - Condition: Very Good - Good - Cloth. First Edition. Very good condition with good plus dust jacket (chips at spine extremities, some closed tears and rubbing but generally attractive and unsunned). - Aida: The Story of Verdi's Famous Opera.
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Domestic media mail postage is $6.50 for first book, $2.00 each additional book; domestic first class or priority mail postage is $17.00 for first book, $10 each additional book; inquire about foreign postage. Heavy or multivolume items may require additional postage, which will be requested. International purchasers of art books and other heavy volumes should note that postage is often double or even triple the quoted rate for a standard book; we cannot subsidize postage for such orders and wil...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we will contact you to request extra charges for shipping.
